thread.title: WATCH: Ohio State's Thad Matta spits out gum yelling, doesn't break character
thread.title_full: WATCH: Ohio State's Thad Matta spits out gum yelling, doesn't break character

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: Ohio State's Thad Matta spits out gum yelling, doesn't break character
text:
23m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Ohio State coach Thad Matta is a well-known high-intensity motivator. He's not afraid to get after his guys to challenge them to be better even if it takes raising his voice to hammer a point home. 
In Tuesday night's game against Maryland , Matta was using the same tactic to try and get to his guys in a huddle during a timeout. But during the process of finger-waving and voice-raisin', he spit his gum out -- and right into his hand. It's OK, Thad Matta, we've all done this. ðŸ˜‰ https://t.co/mNCJSQQhX0 â€” Big Ten Network (@BigTenNetwork) February 1, 2017 
This is the composure of a seasoned coach. Sure, he loses his gum in front of his team. But he spits it right into his hand and, without even breaking character, continues coaching and calmly throws his gum back into his mouth. No smirk. Not even a crack of a grin. Almost like he had been practicing that trick for showtime. 
At halftime, Ohio State was down 42-36 to Maryland in the Big Ten matchup being played in Columbus. Add a comment
